description: DND has a requirement for discrete Backpack Radiation Detectors to support operations and training. This equipment will be used in both autonomous or networked modes for rapid detection, identification and localization of radiological substances. DND has an initial requirement for a quantity of eight (8) Backpack Radiation Detectors, Training and In-Service Support. The contract will include options for more detectors and training serials. Note : A soft copy of the NDA will be provided upon request.
duration_in_months: This is a long-term contract that will be completed in 12 months.
